trans-unit.source: Represents an easing function that creates an animation that accelerates and/or decelerates using the formula *f*(*t*) = *t*<sup>p</sup> where p is equal to the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PowerEase.Power*> property.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en easing-funksjonen, som oppretter en animasjon som får og/eller decelerates ved hjelp av formelen *f*(*t*) = *t*<sup>p</sup> der p er lik den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PowerEase.Power*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PowerEase.Power*>

trans-unit.source: You can control whether the animation accelerates, decelerates, or both by specifying the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan kontrollere om animasjonen får, decelerates, eller begge ved å angi <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following graph demonstrates the different values of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>, where *f*(*t*) represents the animation progress and *t* represents time.
trans-unit.target: Følgende diagrammet viser ulike verdier for <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>, der *f*(*t*) representerer animasjonen fremdriften og *t* representerer klokkeslett.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: ![CubicEase EasingMode graphs.](~/add/media/cubicease-graph.png "CubicEase EasingMode graphs.")
trans-unit.target: ![CubicEase EasingMode diagrammer. ] (~/add/media/cubicease-graph.png "CubicEase EasingMode diagrammer.")

trans-unit.source: By using the PowerEase function, you can specify how quickly acceleration/deceleration takes place by specifying the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PowerEase.Power%2A> property: *f*(*t*) = *t*<sup>p</sup> where `p` is equal to the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PowerEase.Power%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Ved hjelp av PowerEase-funksjonen, kan du angi hvor raskt akselerasjon/deselerasjon foregår ved å angi den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PowerEase.Power%2A>egenskapen: *f*(*t*) = *t*<sup>p</sup> der `p` er lik den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PowerEase.Power%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PowerEase.Power%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PowerEase.Power%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because of this, the PowerEase function can be substituted for <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.QuadraticEase> (*f*(*t*) = *t*<sup>2</sup>), <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.CubicEase> (*f*(*t*) = *t*<sup>3</sup>), <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.QuarticEase> (*f*(*t*) = *t*<sup>4</sup>), and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.QuinticEase> (*f*(*t*) = *t*<sup>5</sup>).
trans-unit.target: Because of this, the PowerEase function can be substituted for <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.QuadraticEase> (*f*(*t*) = *t*<sup>2</sup>), <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.CubicEase> (*f*(*t*) = *t*<sup>3</sup>), <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.QuarticEase> (*f*(*t*) = *t*<sup>4</sup>), and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.QuinticEase> (*f*(*t*) = *t*<sup>5</sup>).</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.QuinticEase></xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.QuarticEase></xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.CubicEase></xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.QuadraticEase>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you wanted to use a PowerEase function to create the same behavior as a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.QuadraticEase> function (*f*(*t*) = *t*<sup>2</sup>), you would specify a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PowerEase.Power%2A> property value of 2.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil bruke en PowerEase-funksjon til å opprette på samme måte som for eksempel en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.QuadraticEase>funksjonen (*f*(*t*) = *t*<sup>2</sup>), du vil angi en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PowerEase.Power%2A>egenskapsverdi for 2.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PowerEase.Power%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.QuadraticEase>

trans-unit.source: There are several other easing functions besides PowerEase which you can explore using the following Silverlight sample.
trans-unit.target: Det er flere easing funksjoner i tillegg til PowerEase som du kan utforske ved å bruke følgende Silverlight-utvalg.

trans-unit.source: [Run this sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=139798&sref=easing_functions_gallery) In addition to using the easing functions included in the run-time, you can create your own custom easing functions by inheriting from <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase>.
trans-unit.target: [Kjør dette eksemplet](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=139798&sref=easing_functions_gallery) i tillegg til ved hjelp av de easing funksjonene som er inkludert i kjøretid, kan du opprette egendefinerte easing funksjoner ved arving fra <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Object Element Usage ``` ```
trans-unit.target: ## XAML objektet elementet Bruk``` ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.PowerEase"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.PowerEase"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"></xref> derived class.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"> </xref> avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: When creating a derived class, you must override this method.
trans-unit.target: Når du oppretter en avledet klasse, må du overstyre denne metoden.

trans-unit.source: Animation classes inherit indirectly from <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>.
trans-unit.target: Animasjon-klasser arve indirekte fra <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: Because of this, you need to override the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase.CreateInstanceCore%2A> method to construct a custom animation object.
trans-unit.target: Du vil overstyre derfor den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase.CreateInstanceCore%2A>metode for å lage et egendefinert animasjon-objekt.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase.CreateInstanceCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: The new instance.
trans-unit.target: Den nye forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Provides the logic portion of the easing function that you can override to produce the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode"></xref> mode of the custom easing function.
trans-unit.target: Gir logic-delen av funksjonen easing som du kan overstyre for å produsere det <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode"> </xref> modus for den egendefinerte easing funksjonen.

trans-unit.source: This method transforms normalized time to control the pace of an animation for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode> case of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden overfører normalisert tid å kontroll over en animasjon for <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>tilfellet for <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>

trans-unit.source: You only have to specify your easing function for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode> case because the implementation of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.Ease%2A> method transforms `normalizedTime` for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode> cases.
trans-unit.target: Du trenger bare å angi den easing funksjonen for den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>tilfelle fordi implementeringen av den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.Ease%2A>metoden transformeringer `normalizedTime` for den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>og <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>tilfeller.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.Ease%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>

trans-unit.source: Normalized time (progress) of the animation.
trans-unit.target: Normalisert klokkeslettet (pågår) animasjonen.

trans-unit.source: A double that represents the transformed progress.
trans-unit.target: En dobbeltverdi som representerer transformert fremdriften.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the exponential power of the animation interpolation.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir i eksponentiell potensen animasjon-interpolering.

trans-unit.source: For example, a value of 7 will create an animation interpolation curve that follows the formula *f*(*t*) = *t*<sup>7</sup>.
trans-unit.target: En verdi av 7 vil for eksempel opprette en animasjonen interpolering kurve som følger formelen *f*(*t*) = *t*<sup>7</sup>.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[DP_ID_field_label](~/add/includes/dp-id-field-label-md.md)] ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ```
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[DP_ID_field_label](~/add/includes/dp-id-field-label-md.md)] ## XAML Attributtbruk ``` ```

trans-unit.source: The exponential power of the animation interpolation.
trans-unit.target: Animasjon-interpolering eksponentiell potensen.

trans-unit.source: This value must be greater or equal to 0.
trans-unit.target: Denne verdien må være større eller lik 0.

trans-unit.source: The default is 2.
trans-unit.target: Standard er 2.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PowerEase.Power*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PowerEase.Power*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PowerEase.Power*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.
